author: kmarsden
msg: Converted errorcode.sql. Changed individual bug queries to print fatal errors tojust print the SQLExceptions with Errorcode >= 40000.
Added a method showResultSet(rs) to org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.Utilities
which will print out a resultSet in two dimensional array format.  This
can be used to make converting tests easier.

author: sichen
msg: Improvement to AgreementTerm:  min and max quantities to define a range applicable to term.
